alert.note: Alert for Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 9:23AM MDT until April 17 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... Little Minnesota River near Peever affecting Roberts County. Minnesota River near Big Stone Lake affecting Roberts, Grant and Big Stone Counties. Minnesota River at Ortonville affecting Big Stone County. North Fork Whetstone River near Milbank affecting Grant County. West Branch 12 Mile Creek At Dumont affecting Traverse County. 5 Mile Creek Near Herman affecting Traverse County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Little Minnesota River near Peever. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Left bank below gage begins flooding. This is the new gage site approx 1 mile north of old site. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 19.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM CDT Friday was 22.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.9 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Saturday evening by 630 PM CDT.
